summary: A movie spun out of equal parts folk tale, fable and real-life legend about the mysterious, 1930s Tennessee hermit who famously threw his own rollicking funeral party... while he was still alive.
cast: Robert Duvall|Sissy Spacek|Bill Murray|Lucas Black|Gerald McRaney|Bill Cobbs|Scott Cooper|Lori Beth Sikes|Linds Edwards|Andrea Powell|Chandler Riggs|Danny Vinson|Blerim Destani|Tomasz Karolak|Andy Stahl|Marc Gowan|Arin Logan|Grace The Amazing Mule|Robert S. Barmettler|Randy Bratton|Deanne Charlton|Frances Cobb|John Collier|Alex Corrado|Rob Crowe|Jym Davis|Dino Demitri|Brandon Germaine|Rebecca Grant|Travis Grant|Robert Hatch|Vinyetta James|Shawn Knowles|Bella Marina Marcello|Jade Moser|Lexi Noel|Nick Searcy|Michael A. Templeton|Catherine Thornton|Kirsten VanWagner
title: El último gran día
